Variables
s_defaultVSLayout

s_defaultVSLayout defines the default layout for our default vertex

Functions
CreateShader
void CGPUPipeline::CreateShader(
BYTE *pShaderCode,
uint32 shaderCodeSize,
ShaderDefs *pShaderParams,
uint32 shaderParamSize,
IShader **ppShader
)

Creates a new shader using the specified byte code and list of shader parameters.

Parameters
pShaderCode
BYTE*

Pointer to byte array containing the shader executable

shaderCodeSize
uint32

Size of pShaderCode in bytes

pShaderParams
ShaderDefs*

List of parameters to set on the shader

shaderParamSize
uint32

Number of parameters in pShaderParams

ppShader
IShader**

Returns the newly created shader object
